title: (x) UPN "Tonight" ident - Comsat-Station {Florian R}
content:
Need to ID the “TONIGHT” title, even something close would be helpful.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [mystery font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20071219133618/http:/typophile.com/files/mystery%20font_1.jpg) | 29.88 KB |

 [‹ NFL Sunday Night Football ident](http://web.archive.org/web/20071219133618/http:/typophile.com/node/40134 "Go to previous forum topic") [Jericho (2006 TV Series) Title Card Font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071219133618/http:/typophile.com/node/40130 "Go to next forum topic")
author: onteevee

comments.content: Thats it! Thank you very much Florian R. Looks like the Comsat is no longer available. A waste for such a cool font! All search links lead to a fonts.com error page. Even tracked down the designer but he is not selling the font personally. If anyone knows another alternative it would be much appreciated. Thanks again.
